source.name: Index to Marine and Lacustrine Geological Samples Viewer
source.description: The Index to Marine and Lacustrine Geological Samples Map Viewer provided by NOAA's National Geophysical Data Center is an interactive map providing access to metadata, data, and images about seafloor and lakebed cores, grabs, and dredge samples (sediment and rock) curated by and available from participating institutions. The map is available in a global (Mercator) projection as well as an Arctic projection. For more information about the Index to Marine and Lacustrine Geological Samples, please see http://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/mgg/curator.
